commands.name: az relay namespace create
commands.syntax:
az relay namespace create --name
                          --resource-group
                          [--location]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--tags]
examples: az relay namespace create --resource-group myresourcegroup --name mynamespace --location westus --tags tag1=value1 tag2=value2

commands.name: az relay namespace delete
commands.syntax:
az relay namespace delete [--ids]
                          [--name]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--subscription]
examples: az relay namespace delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --name mynamespace

commands.name: az relay namespace exists
commands.summary: Check for the availability of the given name for the Namespace.

commands.name: az relay namespace show
commands.summary: Shows the Relay Service Namespace details.
examples: az relay namespace show --resource-group myresourcegroup --name mynamespace

commands.name: az relay namespace update
commands.syntax:
az relay namespace update [--add]
                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--ids]
                          [--name]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--remove]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--set]
                          [--subscription]
                          [--tags]
examples: az relay namespace update --resource-group myresourcegroup --name mynamespace --tags tag=value

commands.name: az relay namespace wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
